article_title: Fixing Healthcare Can Be As Close As Your Neighborhood Pharmacy

article_metadata.description: The clinical emergency is medicine itself Demand for primary care services is projected to increase through 2020, due to the increasing aging and population as well as the expanded insurance coverage implemented under the Affordable Care Act (ACA). In other words, the demand for primary care physicians will grow more rapidly [...]
article_metadata.author: John Nosta
